projectDesc.p: The Göttingen Register of Electronic Texts in Indian Languages (GRETIL) is a resource platform providing standardized machine-readable texts in Indian languages that have been contributed by various individuals and institutions.

correction.p: Apparent errors have been silently corrected.

normalization.p: GRETIL normalizes all texts contributed consistently for each language. Sanskrit texts are normalized in accordance with the scheme of the International Alphabet of Sanskrit Transliteration (IAST) in order to facilitate word search across its corpus without additional transformations.

All characters that were fully equivalent to an IAST-conformant character in the text file contributed have been made to conform to the character list below. Non-conformant characters with additional information including accents, capitalization, and whitespace have been preserved as orig elements inside choice elements with their IAST-conformant equivalent in reg elements for the creation of a plain text. These additional informations will be available only in those transformations of this file that display the original information.

quotation.p: If indicated unambiguously in the text file contributed quotation marks have been replaced with the q element and, in case a reference was provided, have been nested inside a cit with the respective reference provided in a ref element after the quote.

segmentation.p: Unnumbered div elements are used to structure the text, using the type and n attributes in accordance with the refsDecl.

interpretation.p:
Interpretive markup which is visible only in analytic transformations of this file consists of:
Highlighting in hi elements,
Corruptions in sic elements,
Remarks in note elements with the @resp attribute identifying the agency.

lg.l: tad devi sampravakṣyāmi sārāt sārataraṃ param /
rahasyaṃ sarvabuddhānāṃ yat tat sarvātmani sthitam //

body.p:
paścajñānamayaṃ tattvaṃ sarṣapasthūlamātrakam /
tasya madhye sthito devo hyavyakto vyaktarūpavān // iti / Pk_1.13 //

pañcavarṇaṃ mahāratnaṃ prāṇāyāmamiti smṛtam /
svamantraṃ hṛdaye dhyātvā cittaṃ bindugataṃ nyaset // Pk_1.15 /
sarvatathāgatakāyavākcittarahasyaṃ sarvatantrahṛdayasañcodanaṃ nāma paramaguhyaṃ svakāyavākcittavajrebhyo vākpathaniruktyā mantrasamuccayamudājahāra oṃ āḥ hūṃ /

lg.l: bhikṣāśinā na japtavyaṃ na ca bhaikṣarato bhavet /
jātaṃ san niḥsvabhāvo 'pi bhāvākhyaṃ tu pratītyataḥ /
sandhyāya bodhicittaṃ te na vidanti yathārthataḥ //
hrasvaṃ samastavākyaṃ syānna cānekaṃ na caikakam //
ye varṇāḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ proktā abhimukhāśca ye punaḥ /
praveśaśva sthitiścaiva vyutthānaṃ ca krameṇa ca //
mantrārtho bhagavān vajrī vajrātmātra kathaṃ japet //
api ca vajradhṛk kaścit trisaṃyogānvito naraḥ /
vāṣpeṇa sthāpanaṃ tat syād viśvastāt siddhiruttamā //
ayutadvayaṃ sahasraṃ ca ṣaṭ śatāni tathaiva ca /
sidhyate tasya trailokyaṃ māsaikena na saṃśayaḥ //
ṣaḍ lakṣāṇi japitvā tu mantraṃ jñānasamudbhavam /
na tasya vratamākhyātaṃ nākṣasūtraṃ na mantrakam /

body.p:
mantratattvamidaṃ vyaktaṃ vāgvajrasya prasādhanam /
jñānatrayaprabhedena cittamātre niyojayed // iti // Pk_1. 64 //

lg.l: aśraddadhānastvabhiṣekahīno vārtā kramasyāpi ca tasya noktā //
yaḥ śraddadhāno gurubhaktiraktaḥ śuśrūṣaṇāyāṃ ca sadābhiyuktaḥ /
grāhyaḥ śrutiṃ naiva dhanaṃ nirīkṣyaṃ gurupradhāno 'ya guruprasādaḥ //
girīndramūrdhnaḥ prapatet tu kaścit neccheccyutiṃ tu cyavate tathāpi /
guruprasādāptahitopadeśa icchenna moktaṃ sa tathāpi muktaṃḥ //
evaṃ stute namaste 'stu kaḥ stotā kaśca saṃstutaḥ //
yathā jalaṃ jale nyastaṃ ghṛtaṃ caiva yathā ghṛte /
svakīyaṃ ca svayaṃ paśyej jñānaṃ yatreha vandanā //
śūnyaṃ ca atiśūnyaṃ ca mahāśunyaṃ tṛtīyakam /
ālokaśśūnyaṃ prajñā ca cittaṃ ca paratantrakam /
strīsaṃjñā tathā proktā mandākārā tathaiva ca /
parikalpitaṃ tathā proktaṃ proktaṃ caitasikaṃ tathā //
harṣaṇaṃ caiva prāmodyaṃ vismayo hasitaṃ tathā //
dhairyaṃ vīryaṃ ca mānaśca kartṛhartṛbalāni ca //
madhyamaṃ sāhasaṃ rādraṃ vilāso vairameva ca //
śubhaṃ ca vāk sphuṭā satyamasatyaṃ niścayastathā /
alajjā dhūrtaduṣṭaśca haṭhaḥ kuṭila eva ca /
etāḥ prakṛtayaḥ sūkṣmāḥ śataṃ ṣaṣṭyuttaraṃ divā /
kṣaṇe lave muhūrtte ca nimeṣe mātrake tathā /
mātrā tu hastatālaṃ syāt kṣaṇādīnāṃ tu lakṣaṇam //
yatra yatra sthito vāyustāṃ tāṃ prakṛtimudvahet /
yasya vajrābjasaṃyogaḥ saṃvṛtyā tu na vidyate //
lakṣayet satataṃ yogī tāmeva prakṛtiṃ punaḥ /
astīti na ca nāstīti na ca vākyagocaram /
evaṃ śrutvā tu taṃ śbdaṃ visarjyāsphānakaṃ tataḥ /
sāśano nāśano naiva na maunī nāpyamaunavān //
na rāgo na virāgaśca madhyamā nopalabhyate /
na śūnyaṃ nāpi cāśūnyaṃ madhyamā nopalabhyate //
trijñānād vyatiriktaṃ yat tattvaṃ sandhyāya bhāṣayā //
prakṛtyaiva hi sā siddhā tathatā na vikalpajā //
tridhā nābhyasyate yastu na śīghramāpnuyāt phalam //
yaḥ śāṭhyabuddhiralaso gurunindakaśca prāptābhiṣeka iti garvitamānasaḥ syāt /
sarvajñatā na sulabheti vihīnacitto doṣān sa paśyati gurorna guṇān varākaḥ //
sūśrūṣayā virahito laghu tattvamicchen neti praśstavacanaṃ calayet saroṣaḥ /
dṛṣṭvā sabhāsu gurumasya parāṅmukhastu kuryāt praṇāmamatha tasya rahogatasya //
vaiśyaṃ tathā pārthivamagrabodhiṃ kuryāt samīpe na hi jātu dhīraḥ //
śubhaguṇasusameto jñānavān vīryayukto gurujanamatha bhaktyā vīkṣate buddhatulyam /
adhigatajinadharmaḥ śāsaneṣu prasannaḥ sa iha bhavati pātraṃ tasya kuryāt prasādam //
svahitamapi sa kartuṃ na prabhuḥ śāstracañcurbhavati tadapi śāstraṃ kevalaṃ khedahetuḥ //
atha bhavati sabhāgyaḥ prāptatattvopadeśo jaḍamatirasamartho mīlane 'rthasya yastu /
gurucaṇasaparyāprāptatattvopadeśaḥ prabhavati sa hi vaktuṃ tantrarājopadeśam //
kuśalamupacittaṃ yacchākyamitreṇa tena prakaṭapaṭuvipākād bodhibhājo bhavantu // iti //

body.p: prathamataraṃ tāvad utpattikramānusāreṇa prāptābhiṣekaścaturvidhatantrābhiprāyajñaḥ prāptakāyavākcittavivekaḥ śrutidharaḥ satyadvayādhimokṣo vajraguruṃ samyag ārādhya, tataḥ prasannāya gurave mahatīṃ gaṇapūjāṃ kṛtvā ṣoḍaśābdikāṃ mudrāṃ mahāvajragurave datvā, tadanantaraṃ guruvaktrād āptasvādhiṣṭhānakramopadeśaḥ, tato mālodakasambuddhavajraghaṇṭādānadarpaṇanāmācāryānujñā ityebhiḥ saha guhyābhiṣekaṃ labdhvā ebhiḥ śāstāraṃ guruṃ stūyātḥ /

lg.l: śauṣīryaṃ nāsti te kāye māṃsāsthirudhiraṃ na ca /
nāmayā nāśuciḥ kāye kṣuttṛṣṇāsambhavo na ca /

body.p: evaṃ vajraguraṃ sadbhūtaguṇena saṃstutya śravaṇārtham adhyeṣayed anayā gāthayā-

lg.l: adya vyākhyānaratnena prasādaṃ kuru me vibho //
evaṃ śrutvā tu tad vākyam adhyeṣaṇaviśāradam /
asvatantraṃ jagat sarvaṃ svatantraṃ naiva jāyate /
yena cittena bālāśca saṃsāre bandhanaṃ gatāḥ /
na cātrotpadyate kaścin maraṇaṃ nāpi kasyacit /
rūpaṃ ca vedanā caiva saṃjñā saṃskāra eva ca /
māyaiva saṃvṛteḥ satyaṃ kāyaḥ sāmbhogikaśca saḥ //
saiva gandharvasattvaḥ syād vajrakāyaḥ sa eva hi /
vajrasattvaḥ svayaṃ tasmāt svasya pūjāṃ pravartayet //
kalāsu ca pravṛttiṃ ca kuryād udakacandravat //
rūpe śabde tathā gandhe rase spraṣṭavya eva ca /
yad yad ālambayed yogī tad tad māyaiva kalpayet //
darpaṇe pratibimbaṃ ca svapnaṃ māyāṃ ca budbudam /
indrajālaṃ ca sādṛśyaṃ yaḥ paśyed sa prabhuḥ smṛtaḥ //
dṛśyate spṛśyate caiva yathā māyā jagat sadā /
yad yad indriyamārgatvaṃ māyā tattat svabhāvataḥ /
sarvatra sarvataḥ sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvadā svayam /
nāsti kiñcid asādhyaṃ vai vajrasattvena lakṣitam /
kleśāḥ karmapathā dehaḥ kartāraśca phalaṃ ca vai /
kiṃ tena na kṛtaṃ puṇyaṃ kiṃ vā nopāsitaṃ tapaḥ /
ācāryo harate pāpam ācāryo harate bhayam /
tasmai tuṣṭāya gurave pūjāṃ kuryāt tu śaktitaḥ //
stutvā kṛtāñjaliḥ śiṣyo guraṃ sañcodayet punaḥ //
no rātrirnāpi sandhyā na ca bhavati divā yaḥ prakṛtyā vimuktaḥ
sa syād bodhikṣaṇo 'yaṃ varagurukathito yogināmeva gamyaḥ //

body.p:
naiśaṃ dhvāntaṃ vinaṣṭaṃ vyapagatamakhilaṃ sāndhyatejastu yasmin
bhāsvānnodeti yāvat kṣaṇa iha vimale darśayed bhūtakoṭim /

lg.l: anantabhūtaṃ tvathavāntabhūtaṃ tat sarvaśūnyaṃ pravadanti santaḥ //
gamanāgamanaṃ ca yatra nāsti kṣayavṛddhī na cāpyabhāvabhāvau /
ativismayarūpam arūpyavismayaṃ sthitimannāpi na cāpi gatvaram //
yadasti-nāstivyavahāramuktaṃ na puṇyarūpaṃ na ca pāparūpam /
na puṇyapāpātmakamagrabhūtaṃ tat sarvaśūnyaṃ pravadanti buddhāḥ //
yaḥ paryaṭejjñānamayo nṛsiṃhaḥ kṛtsnaṃ jagat so 'vyayakāyalābhī //
sa vāgyuto vāgasamanvito 'pi bhogānvitaḥ so 'pi virupavṛttiḥ /
bhūtakoṭiṃ viśed yogī piṇḍagrāha iti smṛtaḥ //
sthāvaraṃ jaṅgamaṃ caiva pūrvaṃ kṛtvā prabhāsvaram /
mudrābandhaṃ prakuryād vā mantraṃ cāpi japed yadi /
prāptopadeśaḥ subhagaḥ suśiṣyo baudhau hi cittaṃ paramārthanāma /

body.p: sarvabhāvavigataṃ skandhadhātvāyatanagrāhyagrāhakavarjitaṃ dharmanairātmyasamatayā svacittam ādyanutpannaṃ śūnyatāsvabhāvamiti /

lg.l: ratnaṃ gṛhaṃ vā hastyaśvaṃ grāmaṃ vā śayanāsanam //
dāsaṃ dāsīṃ priyāṃ bhāryāṃ putrīṃ cāpyativarṇabhām /

body.p:
prāptācāryaprasādo vimaladṛḍhamatiḥ sarvabhāvasvabhāvaḥ
svacchaṃ śuddhaṃ susūkṣmaṃ paramaśivamayaṃ buddhanirvāṇadhātum /

lg.l: puṇyāpuṇyād vimuktaḥ svayamiha bhagavān jāyate vajrasattvaḥ //
saṅkleśaṃ vyavadānaṃ ca jñātvā tu paramārthataḥ /
ekībhāvaṃ tu yo vettiṃ sa vetti yuganaddhakam //
ekīkṛtya cerad yogī sa vetti yuganaddhakam //
grāhyaṃ ca grāhakaṃ caiva dvidhā buddhirna vidyate /
yuganaddhakramākhyaṃ vai tattvaṃ vetti sa paṇḍitaḥ //
yatra sthito mahāyogī tad bhaved yuganaddhakam //
ityevaṃ kalpanā nāsti tat taddhi yuganaddhakam //
utthānaṃ ca tato yatra samantād yuganaddhakam //
saṃvṛtiṃ paramārthaṃ ca pṛthag jñātvā vibhāgataḥ /
tathātalambanaṃ naiva vyutthānaṃ yatra naiva hi /
yā sthitiryogināṃ buddhā yuganaddhaṃ vadanti tat //
iti yā kalpanābhinnā yatra tad yuganaddhakam //
yaḥśāntiṃ vetti yogīndraḥ sa prāpto yuganaddhakam //
evaṃ vai yaḥ sthito yogī yuganaddhakrame sthitaḥ /
ucyate sa hi sarvajñaḥ tattvadarśī ca viśvadhṛk //

body.p:
etadevādvayaṃ jñānam apratiṣṭhitanirvṛtiḥ /
buddhatvaṃ vajrasattvatvaṃ sarvaiśvaryaṃ tathaiva ca // Pk_5.25 /

lg.l: bhāvayed yuganaddhaṃ tu caryāṃ cāpi tadanvayām //
yathātmani tathā śatrau yathā bhāryā tathātmajā /
yathā mātā tathā vaiśyā yathā ḍombī tathā dvijā //
yathā vastraṃ tathā carma yathā ratnaṃ tathā tuṣam /
yathā mūtraṃ tathā madyaṃ yathā bhaktaṃ tathā śakṛt //
yathā stutikaraṃ vākyaṃ tathā vākyaṃ jugupsitam //
yathā rudrastathā vajrī yathā rātrīstathā divā /
yathā svapnaṃ tathā dṛṣṭaṃ yathā naṣṭaṃ tathā sthitam //
yathā saukhyaṃ tathā duḥkhaṃ yathā duṣṭastathā sutaḥ /
evaṃ jñātvā cared jñānī nirviśaṅkastu sarvakṛt /

body.p:
prajñākaruṇayoraikyaṃ jñātvā yatra pravartate /
yuganaddha iti khyātaḥ kramo 'yaṃ buddhagocaraḥ //
(pañcakramaḥ, 5-7)

atyudgāḍharayasthirākṛtighanadhvānabhramanmandara-
kṣubdhadhīradhivīcisañcayagataprāleyapādopamaḥ /
śrīmatpotalake gabhīravivṛtidhvānapratidhvānite
sāndrasvāṃśucayaśriyā valayito lokeśvaraḥ pātu vaḥ //
(subhāṣitaratnakośe vidyākaraḥ)

na satyā nāsatyā na ca tadubhayī nāpyanubhayī
nirullekhā sarvākṛtivaramayī madhyamakadhīḥ /
jinaḥ śāstā saiva sthira-calajagattattvamapi sā
svasaṃvittirdevī jayati sukhavajrapraṇayinī //
(amṛtakaṇikābhidhāyāṃ nāmasaṃgītiṭikāyām, raviśrīḥ)

ye dharmā hetuprabhavā hetusteṣāṃ tathāgato hyavadat /
teṣāṃ ca yo nirodha evaṃvādī mahāśramaṇaḥ //
